snippet.title: 10 Nifty Diabetes Apps
snippet.description: * 10 Nifty Diabetes Apps In 1987 I was researching an article about a young man who was making big waves in San Francisco commercial real estate. One day as I was interviewing him he asked me to accompany him on a walk to a client’s office several blocks away. He was one of ...

snippet.title: Brain Games: Stay Mentally Active to Prevent Alzheimer’s
snippet.description: * Brain Games: Stay Mentally Active to Prevent Alzheimer’s Learn how to stay mentally fit and possibly ward off Alzheimer’s by learning something new, speaking more than one language, reading, playing chess, and more.
